function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased housing precarity among low-income populations and people of color","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 infection, complication, and death among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement eviction prevention measures and provide support for housing stability","Technologies":"Community-based interventions, financial support programs","People":"Low-income populations, people of color","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Eviction and housing displacement increases the spread of COVID-19 among vulnerable populations","Impact":"Higher transmission of COVID-19 and a cycle of poor health and housing instability","Mitigation":"Implement eviction moratoria and supportive measures","Technologies":"Legislation, community support programs","People":"Vulnerable populations, people in poverty, people of color","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of housing stability increases the risk of COVID-19 infection, transmission, illness, and death","Impact":"Increased burden on healthcare systems and higher mortality rates among at-risk populations","Mitigation":"Comprehensive eviction prevention and housing stability measures","Technologies":"Healthcare resources, community-based interventions","People":"At-risk populations, low-income individuals, people of color","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations"}]}
